## FilterBuilder.offset() method

Set `offset`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
offset(offset: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | Offset of the number of records to be returned |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
